products.title: Splash Frost Roller Blind
products.description: Splash frost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Splash frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

products.title: Splash Paper White Roller Blind
products.description: Splash paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their splash paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe.

products.title: Splash Snow White Roller Blind
products.description: Add a bit of style to your home with this fabulous cream roller blind. Product id: sdb-rbx1578 fabric colour: snow material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash snow white roller blind in white.

products.title: Splash Ivory Off-white Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Ivory off-white is a fabulous shade, perfect to pair with natural wooden tones in the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Ivory Off-white 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Ivory off-white is a fabulous shade, perfect to pair with natural wooden tones in the home. Their vertical blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Snow White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Splash snow vertical blinds provide a beautiful and fresh finish when dressing windows. It is an attractive bright white colour. The splash snow fabric is also moisture resistent making them perfect for kitchens and bathrooms. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. As this is one of their made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Paper White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash paper white is a chic medium brown vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this white vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Frost 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Splash frost vertical blinds have a very fresh and crisp finish. The fabric is an attractive, clean white colour. This fabric is also moisture resistent making them perfect for kitchens and bathrooms. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. As this is one of their made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Snow - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash snow light filtering skylight blind, is an attractive pure white colour which is the perfect blind to help transform a space. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Splash Snow White Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Perfect fit roller blinds clip straight onto the window, which provides a hassle free, no drilling way to update your window. The framework comes in 4 different shades to match your window frame. This fabric is also moisture resistant making it the perfect choice for bathrooms and kitchens.

products.title: Splash Paper White Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash paper white perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this offf-white perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Ivory Off-white Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Ivory off-white is a fabulous shade, perfect to pair with natural wooden tones in the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Frost Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash frost perfect fit roller blinds are a beautiful, fresh & crisp white colour. They are particularly well suited to kitchens and bathrooms as the fabric is moisture resistant. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly onto the window, which means no drilling. The framework is also available in 4 different colour options to compliment any room.

products.title: Splash Snow White Panel Blind
products.description: Splash snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Splash snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens or high traffic areas. Panel blinds are their best choice for big windows and their go-to recommendation for french windows and patio doors. Product id: db-pan0263 fabric colour: snow material: 100% polyester headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash snow white panel blind in white.

products.title: Splash Paper White Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash paper white panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This off-white dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Frost White Panel Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This white panel blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This panel blind with accompanying white components and white fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.
